description:
Rasa NLU & Rasa Core are open source libraries for building machine learning-based chatbots and voice assistants. In this live-coding workshop you will learn the fundamentals of conversational AI and how to build your own using these open source libraries. In this workshop we will live-code a useful, engaging conversational AI bot based entirely on machine learning.

Slides: /redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.slideshare.net%2FTomBocklisch%2Fconversational-ai-with-rasa-pydata-workshop-98683172&v=zRqjH7fT0G0&redir_token=4JR5MTRDX5vuHQa-M9YScsd2LXJ8MTUzMjc1ODc0M0AxNTMyNjcyMzQz&event=video_description
title: Conversational AI with Rasa Core & NLU
